profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.3.5 Font subsets
profile.description: Embedded font programs shall define all font glyphs referenced for rendering with a conforming file
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: Embedded font programs shall define all font glyphs referenced for rendering with a conforming file

error.message: Not all glyphs referenced for rendering are present in the embedded font program
